top.title: New Trump envoy says he will serve to make Greenland part of US
top.summary: Denmark warns Washington to respect its sovereignty, while Greenland says it will decide its own future.

top.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
top.summary: Lt Gen Fanil Sarvarov is the third military official to have been killed in bomb attacks in the Russian capital over the last year.

top.title: Baby followed by BBC back in Gaza hospital after treatment abroad
top.summary: The BBC revisits one-year-old Siwar Ashour who was temporarily evacuated to Jordan for medical treatment during the Gaza war.

top.title: Uber and Lyft announce plans to trial Chinese robotaxis in UK in 2026
top.summary: Baidu's Apollo Go robotaxis have already accrued millions of driverless rides in cities worldwide.

top.title: Will the US TikTok deal make it safer but less relevant?
top.summary: The key to the app's success - its algorithm - is to be retrained on US data. Will that make US TikTok blander?

top.title: TikTok owner signs deal to avoid US ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.
